items.sentence: Tom and I have never actually met. We've only spoken on the phone.
I hope we have enough time to do everything that needs to be done.
Ants can lift things that are more than 50 times their own weight.
I heard that beer was cheaper than water in Germany. Is that true?
Have you been to Australia or New Zealand in the past three weeks?
Tom got there early to make sure everything had been set up right.
If we don't find water we can drink, we won't survive much longer.
Tom began to study karate when he was still in junior high school.
The driver sped past the yield sign, not slowing in the slightest.
At first the job looked good to Tom, but later it became tiresome.
